mutants.code:
import string

def filter_words(characters, words):
    characters_set = set(characters.lower())
    translator = str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation)
    words = [word.translate(translator) for word in words]
    filtered_words = []
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        if all((char in characters_set for char in word)):
            filtered_words.append(''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word)))
    return filtered_words

import string

def filter_words(characters, words):
    characters_set = set(characters.lower())
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)
    words = [word.translate(translator) for word in words]
    filtered_words = []
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        if all((char not in characters_set for char in word)):
            filtered_words.append(''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word)))
    return filtered_words

import string

def filter_words(characters, words):
    characters_set = set(characters.lower())
    translator = str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)
    words = [word.translate(translator) for word in words]
    filtered_words = []
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        if all((char in characters_set for char in word)):
            filtered_words.append('MUTATED'.join(filter(str.isalpha, word)))
    return filtered_words
